Name: VR Mini World Roller Coaster
About the game: This game is a casual and entertaining game where players will experience the surprise of the microscopic world under a unique perspective. You can freely control the speed of the roller coaster, so that you can stop to admire the scenery carefully at the same time as the high-speed excitement. About this game: Microscopic view unique experience The familiar office has a different experience under the microscopic view. The small details that you normally don't notice are shown in front of you in a magnified way. It allows you to view a different landscape. Beauty is enjoying her relaxing time. Let's have a closer look at her. The whole city has just started its busy day. The cold streets and tall buildings of the city have a sense of being in a steel jungle. The few flickering lights add to the feeling of solitude. New York at sunset is a different kind of beauty. In the sunset alone flying between the buildings, watching the scenery at the moment. Instructions: The left controller: UI interactions; the menu button for menu, the trigger button for selection. Right controller: touchpad up for acceleration; touchpad down for deceleration.
